local_intent: Perceive the red_cylinder, confirm visibility, approach and align with 1 cm tolerance, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Target is within reachable workspace; fallback scan can localize if initial detection fails.
coherence_with_global: Implements perceive -> visibility check -> ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.01, timeout 3000) and post-approach verification, matching the global parameters and approach phase.
